text: Trzebieszowice () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lądek- Zdrój, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Lądek- Zdrój, south-east of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 1,155. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Trzebieszowice
